00020         struct find_enum {
00021                 unsigned int val;
00022                 find_enum(unsigned int v) : val(v) { }
00023                 bool operator()(const member& mem) {
00024                         return mem.get_type() == MEMBER_ENUMERATION 
00025                                 && ((const enumeration_member&)mem).get_value() == val; 
00026                 }
00027         };
00028 
00029         struct find_attribute
00030         {
00031                 EAttributeType attr_t;
00032                 find_attribute(EAttributeType t) : attr_t(t) { }
00033                 bool operator()(const attribute& attr) { return attr.get_type() == attr_t; }
00034         };
00035 
00037 
00038         bool converter::to_string(const value_type_pair &vt, char *buf, size_t size)
00039         {
00040                 if(vt.Type->tag() != T_ENUM)
00041                 {
00042                         type::attribute_iterator it = std::find_if(
00043                                 vt.Type->attributes_begin(), vt.Type->attributes_end(),
00044                                 find_attribute(ATTR_PARSING));
00045 
00046                         if(it != vt.Type->attributes_end())
00047                                 return static_cast<const parsing_attribute*>(&*it)->to_string(vt.Value, buf, size);
00048                 }
00049                 else
00050                 {
00051                         const user_type& ut = static_cast<const user_type&>(*vt.Type);
00052                         user_type::member_iterator it = std::find_if(
00053                                 ut.members_begin(), ut.members_end(),
00054                                 find_enum(*(unsigned int*)vt.Value));
00055 
00056                         if(it != ut.members_end())
00057                         {
00058                                 const char* name = it->get_name();
00059                                 strncpy(buf, name, size - 1);
00060                                 return strlen(name) < size;
00061                         }
00062                 }
00063                 return false;
00064         }
00065 
00067 
00068         bool converter::try_parse(const reflection::value_type_pair &vt, const char *str)
00069         {
00070                 if(vt.Type->tag() != T_ENUM)
00071                 {
00072                         type::attribute_iterator it = std::find_if(
00073                                 vt.Type->attributes_begin(), vt.Type->attributes_end(),
00074                                 find_attribute(ATTR_PARSING));
00075 
00076                         if(it != vt.Type->attributes_end())
00077                                 return static_cast<const parsing_attribute*>(&*it)->try_parse(vt.Value, str);
00078                 }
00079                 else
00080                 {
00081                         const user_type& ut = static_cast<const user_type&>(*vt.Type);
00082                         user_type::member_iterator it = ut.find_member(str);
00083 
00084                         if(it.is<enumeration>())
00085                         {
00086                                 unsigned int* pui = (unsigned int*)vt.Value;
00087                                 *pui = it.get<enumeration>().get_value();
00088                                 return true;
00089                         }
00090                 }
00091                 return false;
00092         }
